title: Are there any modern books like 'Brave New World'? - Quora

response.answer_text: Of course it all depends on what your definition of “like” is. For me the most powerful theme of the Brave New World was that it was a dystopia. If we mean “like” as “are dystopian like Brave New World” then my favourite modern dystopian novels are the 2 books of the Earthseed series, by Octavia E. Butler: Parable of the Sower and Parable of the Talents Earthseed series Or you could have your pick from many dystopian works: Best Dystopian and Post-Apocalyptic Fiction
